short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Terminal and Graphical code Editor for Espruino JavaScript Microcontrollers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See http://www.espruino.com/qs for detailed instructions.

PERMISSIONS this app needs:

* Serial port : for communication with the Espruino board
* Audio : for communication with an Espruino board via the headphone jack: http://www.espruino.com/Headphone
* Webcam : so that teachers can present live video of the board, overlaid with text
* Local storage : so when set up, you can store code and modules locally


This is Free and Open Source (https://github.com/espruino/EspruinoWebIDE). If you have any problems, please report them on GitHub as 'issues'
